tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voice_assistant_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    command_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE voice_logs ( 
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    assistant_id INT, 
    timestamp TIMESTAMP, 
    utterance VARCHAR(255), 
    response VARCHAR(255) 
);

CREATE TABLE assistant_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assistant_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    speech_text VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE AssistantUsers (
	user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	assistant_id INT,
	username TEXT,
	email TEXT,
	created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AssistantLocations (
	location_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	assistant_id INT,
	location_name TEXT,
	latitude DECIMAL,
	longitude DECIMAL
);
